bucket-view-help-select: Names of columns to select, seperated by a space. Such as page_name uses_material
bucket-view-help-where: A valid lua string to be run inside mw.ext.bucket.where()
bucket-view-help-limit: The number of results to return per page. Maximum 500.
bucket-view-help-offset: How far to offset the returned values
bucket-action-writes-empty: No Buckets are written to from this page.
bucket-api-help-query: Invalidates all other params. Must be a fully valid lua Bucket call.
bucket-api-help-bucket: A valid Bucket name. Required if query param is not set.
bucket-api-help-select: A list of columns to select, seperated by spaces.
bucket-api-help-where: A lua string that goes inside of mw.ext.bucket.where().
bucket-namespace-move-into: Cannot move pages to the Bucket namespace.
bucket-delete-fail-in-use: Cannot delete a Bucket that is written to.
bucket-no-bucket-defined-warning: No Bucket name defined for writing.
bucket-capital-name-warning: Bucket name should be all lower case.
bucket-capital-name-error: Bucket name must be all lower case.
bucket-put-syntax-error: mw.ext.bucket.put() argument must be a table.
bucket-schema-no-columns-error: Need at least one column in the schema.
bucket-schema-must-be-strings: All field names must be strings: $1.
bucket-query-select-duplicate-join: Bucket $1 is already used in mw.ext.bucket.join() and cannot be used again.
bucket-query-invalid-join-two-repeated: Cannot use mw.ext.bucket.join() on two repeated fields: $1, $2
